item.description:
Dimsum by Special Request!

Since Jeraliey is back in town, let's eat even *more* dim sum!

If you can't make it for the 30th, please feel free to suggest another time in your comments.

Hope to see you there!

Directions:
From Downtown Crossing (Red Line) or Chinatown (Orange Line):
Walk south on Washington Street.
Emperor's Garden has a prominent sign.
We'll meet on the lobby inside.
NOTE IF YOU ARRIVE AFTER 11:30 -- we will have gone upstairs. If you've seen us before and can pick us out of the dining hall, come on in. If you're a newbie, there's really no easy way to find us.

For more information, see Emperor's Garden

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Meetup!
